testsuite.name: sanity.JodUpgrade
testsuite.system-out: Clicked on Sign In Link Sending username and password Selecting Upgrade from popup PTN Selector Page title verified Searching the PTN in search bar Selected iPhone12 Pro from Device Page Selected Lease Payoff termination option Selected IB contract term from PDP Selected Continue Button from PDP Page Add to cart button click in Upgrade flow Clicked on Checkout button in cart page Selecting Overnight Shipping option in Delivery Page Accepted terms with Device Agreements Sent Card details successfully
